item.title: Pro-life Protesters Facing Prison Sentences (I Stand With The 10) [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
These Christians need your prayer and support. Join Rusty Thomas, Derin Stidd, Gabe Rench, and Dr. George Grant on July 2-3, 2024 to comfort these Christians as they await their sentencing in Nashville, TN. 

Share this message as the Church must stand together

For the Rally sign up here: https://fb.me/e/2sYJ0WQeF
